sentences.en: “Are you a good farmhand？”the farmer asked him.
sentences.cn: “你是个干农活的好手吗？” 农场主问他。
你是个干农活的好手 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dressed as a peasant, I made friends with a farmhand in the village.
sentences.cn: 我打扮成农民模样, 和村里一位雇农交上了朋友.

sentences.en: Every farmhand in the region has enjoyed her for free.
sentences.cn: 她和这地区每个农夫都无偿的搞过.

sentences.en: Finally, a short, thin man, well past middle age, approached the farmer. "Are you a good farmhand?" the farmer asked him.
sentences.cn: 最后，有一个个头不高、略显瘦弱、已过中年的男人来到农场主面前。“你是个干农活的好手吗？”农场主问他。

sentences.en: He doubles the parts of a farmhand and a miner.
sentences.cn: 在这出戏里他既扮演雇农又扮演矿工.

sentences.en: He was a farmhand. He could not afford to send his son to school.
sentences.cn: 他是个雇农, 他供不起儿子上学.

sentences.en: She looks better than a farmhand really should.
sentences.cn: 她比一个实际的农场工人好看多了。

sentences.en: They proposed that he should resume his job as farmhand.
sentences.cn: 他们建议他应重新做农夫的工作.

trans.tran_cn: 农业工人，农场工人，雇农
trans.tran_en: someone who works on a farm
